comment._content: @paulmichaelsnr -- that's probably the platoon leader in his lieutenant's uniform.  :)

comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: Uniforms appear to mimic European hunting costumes of the period, leading me to suspect that these are what the Germans would call Jaeger (hunter) troops.  Jaegers were/are light infantry, usually employed ahead of or to the flanks of the line of battle.
